snippet: The casino conglomerate’s corporate governance was called into question in a report that also rejected the arguments by C.E.O. Steve Wynn’s ex-wife of why she should remain on the board.
abstract: Institutional Shareholder Services issues scathing report that sides with neither Elaine P Wynn, Wynn Resorts co-founder and ex-wife of chief executive Stephen A Wynn, or company; Wynn has been in battle to stay on company board; report calls for rejection of all board nominees, as well as Elaine Wynn.
lead_paragraph: The casino conglomerate’s corporate governance was called into question in a report that also rejected the arguments by C.E.O. Steve Wynn’s ex-wife of why she should remain on the board.

headline.main: Wynn Resorts’ Board, Its Nominees and Elaine Wynn Are All Denounced in Shareholder Report
headline.print_headline: Report Denounces the Board at Wynn and Rejects Nominees
